name: AbcWarmStart
brief: Extended warm start with factorization caching for ABC

algorithms.name:
Extended Warm Start with Cached Factorization
Extends CoinWarmStartBasis to store additional information for efficient
restart of ABC simplex. Beyond basic/nonbasic status, can store:

Type encoding:
- 0: Standard basis (as CoinWarmStartBasis)
- 1,2: Plus factor order as shorts/ints (high bit = column)
- 3,4: Plus compact saved factorization
- +8: Steepest edge weights stored (as floats)

Also defines AbcWarmStartOrganizer for managing multiple warm starts
in tree search (branch and bound) scenarios.

Key features:
- deleteRows()/deleteColumns(): Maintain valid basis after problem changes
- createBasis0/12/34(): Create warm starts of different types
- Support for incremental factorization updates

see: CoinWarmStartBasis in CoinUtils for the base class
ClpSimplex::getWarmStart() for standard warm start creation
